project.name: artwork
project.description: The Gentoo Artwork Project manages Gentoo artwork stuff. This includes wallpapers, logos, themes, icons sets, etc.

longdescription.p: As the community using Gentoo as a desktop operating system continues to grow, one of the main areas which the users tend to concentrate on are the themes and artwork of their desktop. We created this project precisely for these users! The Gentoo Artwork Project (GAP) is a desktop subproject and is responsible for creation and maintenance of all the artwork-related stuff within Gentoo.

body.p: The Gentoo Artwork Project is open to all contributions. If you would like to get involved in the project, feel free to ask members of the project, in #gentoo-desktop on irc.freenode.net, of course, you can still contact all of us via artwork@gentoo.org. All artwork sent to us will be greatly appreciated.
Check out some of the logos and graphical building blocks used to create Gentoo artwork.
